poems.content:
Ek nazm likhne ke liye mujhe aurat chahiye.. 🎀
Hubahu us shakhs jaisi surat chahiye.. 🫂
Na koi shor ho, aur na koi dastak ho, 🌷
Uske saath khaali kamre mein fursat chahiye.. 👀
Choodiyan to le aaya main uske khatir, 🌹
Lekin uski kalai pakadne ke liye himmat chahiye.. 🙈
Uske badan ko poore tareeke se taraashne ke liye, 🌙
Mujhe uski razaamandi aur lehze mein nazakat chahiye.. 🥀

Uski narazgi ka mai kya karu??? 💭
Siwaay ehtraam ke mai kya karu?? 🌙
Mujhe to milna hai uss shaqs se, 🩷
Woh mujhe dekhna nahi chahti toh mai kya karu?? 🎀
Usko chahiye mujhse mohabbat 'rohannnn', 🤌🏻
Lekin mujhko jism ki latt lag chuki hai toh mai kya karu?? 🫀
Meri aarzo hai ki woh aa jaaye wapas mere paas, 🍂
Lekin meri duaa qabool nahi hoti toh mai kya karu?? 🧿

Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..
Wo kyaa hai? mera khawab,
Khawab kya hai? tript hona,
Tript kya hai? meri mohabbat,
Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..🥀

Wo kyaa hai? ik sukoon,
Sukoon kya hai? uski khamoshi,
Khamoshi kyaa hai? Bss ek ehsaas,
Ehsaas kya hai? usse mohabbat,
Mohabbat kyaa hai? shayad "wo"..🤍

Hosh aaya toh laga, main haqeeqat mein hoon ya kisi khwaab mein pahunh chuka hoon.
Use mandap mein le jaya ja raha hai, na jaane main kahaan pahunh chuka hoon.
Kisi anjaane ke haathon mein nariyal, aur uske kaampte hue haath,
Woh dulhan ke kapdon mein hai, shayad main uski shaadi tak pahunh chuka hoon.

Aansu bahte gaye, rasmein poori hoti rahi aur raat bhi dhalne lagi,
Yeh sab apni aankhon se dekhkar, main mafloozi mein pahunh chuka hoon.
Ab toh uske maathay mein sindoor aur kalai mein kangan hai "rohannnn",
Chaar saalon ke intezaar mein, main dard ki qabr tak pahunh chuka hoon.

Bulanaa mujhko mai aungaa jarrur teri sagaai mein..
Mere dil ka kya hai mai fek dunga usko khaai mein..
Ek toh mere imtehaan, upar se tera janamdin,
Kaatkar lagaa de khanjar tu meri kalaai mein..

Puchna usse kya tofa diya hai uske mehboob ne,
Koi toh bola bass thi ek raat tere raqeeb ke rajaai mein..
Tune kya December December lagaa rakha hai rohannn,
Bass tu padhta jaa duaa uski bhalaayi mein..

Mai aadhi raat ko pankhee ko dekhta rehta hoon...
Tu kyaa kr rhi hogi iss waqt bass yhi sochta rehta hoon...
Ab toh dhoop ki aas karenge log iss sard mausam mein,
Mai toh bagair kisi jism ko odhe sota rehta hoon...

Jaane de, usee jaane de apne zehan se "rohannn",
Ab toh tawaif ke saamne mai apni hawas naapta rehta hoon..
Tu itna bhi khwaar na ho ki log tere badan ko hi chahe,
Bass isi darr se mai tujhe harr galiyon mein dhoondhta rehta hoon...

Thakan jab jyada ho tumko to mere paas aakar, mere andar kho jaana..
Rote-rote jab haal kharab kar lo tum apna, mere shaane par aakar so jaana..

Isiliye shayad tune bataya hi nahii dukh apna,
Pareshaan ho jab bhi tum mere gale, lagkar tum ro jaana..

Tumhaare naam ke saare sabdh jod rakhe hai "rohannn",
Iss gazal ke sbhi phla akshar tere naam se juda hai,
Phir bhi naa maano toh kisi aur ke ho jaana..

Tumse ishq karna mera intikhaab to nahin.. 🫀
Itna na padho mujhko main koi kitaab to nahin.. 🍂
Shab-o-roz woh mere paas mere saamne baithi rehti hai, 🤲🏻
Main to nafsiyati hoon, kahin "woh" khwaab to nahin.. 🔪

Uske surkh hothon ka nasha tujhko kaise lag gaya "rohannn", 🥀
Main to zehar pee raha tha koi sharaab to nahin.. 🥂

Jismani sukoon ko woh hamnawa samajh baithi hai, use maara jaaye.
Kai paagalon ko ishq ne thikaane lagaye hai jo na laga use maara jaaye.

Suna hai usko shauk hai mehndi lagane ke,
Jiska naam hogi uski hatheli par, kaash woh maara jaaye.

Saji hogi woh dulhan bankar apne nikaah ke liye,
Bhari baraat mein uske hone wala shauhar maara jaaye.

Uska manpasandida rang sufaid hai,
Kyon na yeh uska mustaqbil banaya jaaye, kaash woh maara jaaye.

Nazmein-ghazlein likhne ke bahaane na jaane kitni badduaayein dedi tumne "rohannn"
Chhodo saari baaton ko usse pehle yeh nafsiyati-kamzarf maara jaaye..

Uski tasveer, tasveer nahi keemti amaanat hai, 🥀
Agar gir jaaye toh uske zulfen toh qayamat hai,

Apni saheliyon ke saamne usne daawa kiya ki "rohannnn" jismon ka shaukeen hai,
Aur hum hai ki sabko bata rakha hai ki woh humaari aakhri chahat hai. 🫀

Usne apne nikaah ke liye bhi mere hi dushman ko chuna,
Humne bhi uske shaadi ka mahaul aisa banaya jaise koi iddat hai!!

Main uski aadatein apni aadaton mein daalna chahta hoon... 🫶🏻
Usko darshan pasand hai to main bas usko sunna chahta hoon... 🧸

Kisi din woh mile aur mere paas baithe to bolun usse, 🫀
Khwaabon mein nahin haqeeqat mein bhi tumse hi nikaah karna chahta hoon... 💍

Mere ikhtiyaar mein nahin tumhe bhool paana "rohannnn", 🤍
Woh kisi ki utaran ho to bhi usi ko pehnna chahta hoon... 🥀

Uski dhundhli yaadein yahi kahi padi hai kisi kone mein... 💭
Kya-kya dastavej lagte hai kisi ka hone mein.. 👀

Tum kya jaano "rohannn" ye ehd-e-wafa kya hota hai, 🥀
Bahut farq hai mohabbat aur tawaif ke saamne rone mein... 🫀

Jyada se jyada tera nikaah hoga kisi aur se, 💍
Lekin tum toh maahir ho gairo ke saath hum-bistar hone mein.. 🖤
